Detailed Description

Main file for Learning/FDB implementation Contains hash functions and other routines used to implement a Learning/FDB implementation.

HashTable_t *  tablePtr 
)

Find given a MAC ID and remove it from the table.

Parameters
macIdMAC which is to be found

Return values
pass/fail.0 means operation failed (mac not found)
